title: Cant Load A Game
body: I don't know what the problem is I've repaired my lol client ive removed any possible threats got no firewall protections just keep getting error of not being able to connect to server when im about to begin a game I find a lobby it loads just keep getting the same error.

replies.body:
Hi - what ISP are you with?

There was an issue with one of the providers that many ISPs use to reach the League game servers (IX Australia), which happened earlier tonight - [thread here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/FErIFkEZ-march-31st-2016-server-issue).  As fallout from this issue it looks like some players are having lingering problems with their connections despite the root cause being fixed.

Depending on ISP this might have affected you - and it might possibly be a lingering issue as some players are seeing (depending on if your ISP took any actions to route around the problem provider).  I'd expect this to be resolved soon enough - but it might be worth getting in touch with them if the issues are continuing tomorrow.

Cheers
Mindstar

I am now getting this error message. I just tried to play a ranked game and right after champ select I got this error. I cant load a game at all, including custom.

Whats worse is I lost the game and got put on notice for leaving/afk. Probably got reported for it too.

My ISP is OneDial.

PLEASE HELP!

Yep these were some of the ones reported as still affected - we're working to see if there's anything we can tweak on our end to get you guys in game.  If not you might need to get in touch and let them know you are having issues.
